subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Paul Tergat, who holds the men’s world record for the marathon, and Catherine Ndereba, who won the silver medal in the 2004 Olympic marathon for women, were announced yesterday as the first professional runners to enter the first NYC Half-Marathon, to be held on Aug. 27.
